text: Romain Arneodo and Hugo Nys were the defending champions but chose not to defend their title. Fabrício Neis and Fernando Romboli won the title after defeating Sadio Doumbia and Fabien Reboul 6–4, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio - Trofeo Dimmidisì - Doubles 2019 Doubles
title: 2019 Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio – Trofeo Dimmidisì – Doubles
